fullTerms.title: Full demo terms & privacy notice
items: The conversation may be recorded and transcribed; it can be paused at any time.
Clinicians review every suggestion before it is saved or exported.
Captured audio and notes stay on this device unless you export or delete them.
No production EHR, billing, or training systems are connected in this sandbox.
You may clear all visit history immediately after the session.

sharedConsent.title: Shared Visit Consent
sharedConsent.description: Both clinician and patient agree to use Clinical Copilot for this session. Nothing is saved unless it is reviewed together.
items: Patient is comfortable with guided documentation for this visit.
Clinician keeps final say on every note, order, and recommendation.
